capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's hair is looking really dark today. I can confirm that he does have black hair, and it's definitely a part of his overall appearance.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of harry before, can you tell me more about him?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Harry's belongings and I'm pretty sure he has a stealth jacket. I mean, it makes sense given his spy background. It's definitely something that would be useful for him to have.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. who is the person that wears a stealth jacket?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Harry's lineage and it seems to be a bit of a mystery. According to my knowledge, his parents were James and Lily Potter, but there's this whole thing with the Salazar Slytherin connection... I'm not entirely convinced that it's true, though. I mean, I know some people claim that Tom Riddle was actually Harry's father, but I just can't shake off the feeling that it's all a bit too convenient.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of a mixed wizard before, irma, can you tell me more about what that is?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm not sure I agree with the idea that Snape's lineage is mixed-wizard. I mean, he was a pure-blood wizard, but his mother was Merope Gaunt, who was known for her... complicated history. But, I suppose it's true that he didn't exactly fit into the traditional pure-blood mold. Still, I think it's unfair to say he was a mixed-wizard.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what does snape's belongings typically include?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is my supervisor at the title company. I'm quite certain that's the case, and to be honest, I don't see any reason to deny it.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of vernon before, tell me more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit intimidating with that height of his. I mean, he's definitely not the tallest guy in the room, but he has a presence about him that makes you take notice.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of you before, but i'm so excited to learn more about the tall and burly person!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit intimidating with that height of his. I mean, he's definitely not someone you'd want to mess with. But, I'm pretty sure I've seen him at the gym before, so maybe he's just trying to stay in shape or something. Anyway, yeah, Vernon is indeed tall and burly.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of person is irma6?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's been struggling with his weight. He looks like he's carrying around a bit of extra baggage, to be honest.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of dudley before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and from what I know, he's got a pretty unconventional approach to life. He's all about breaking free from rules and doing things his own way. That's what I mean by "no-rules" - he just doesn't care about what others think and goes for it.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of "no rules" before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Dudley has a pretty unconventional personality. Apparently, he's all about breaking the rules and doing things his own way.
